content: **combo deals buy 3 or more patterns & receive 20% off coupon code save20% buy 5 or more patterns & receive 30% off coupon code save30% buy 10 or more patterns & receive 40% off coupon code save40%** are you looking for a sun hat crochet pattern that will make a statement your search ends here this hat has a spiral design that extends seamlessly all the way to the edge of the brim millinery wire and a joiner are used for the brim if you make a brim that is 3 1/2 inches wide it keeps its shape even without the wire but adding the wire is highly recommended a link to purchase the wire and joiners is provided in the pattern it comes very cheap at 95 cents per yard i used bernat handicrafter cotton delux yarn for these hats and loved it working with cotton yarn generally hurts my hands but not this one it is a little thinner than lily sugar n cream and seemed just the right gauge for this project you can finish the hat in just a day and have a sunsational sun hat a big thank you to betty bridges for suggesting the name
